org.embulk.util.rubytime

Class RubyDateTimeFormatter

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.embulk.util.rubytime.RubyDateTimeFormatter

  • public final class RubyDateTimeFormatter
extends Object
    Formatter for printing and parsing date-time objects.

    Methods in this class are designed to be similar to DateTimeFormatter.

    Parsing is implemented as a two-phase operation like DateTimeFormatter does.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static RubyDateTimeFormatter ofPattern(String pattern)
      Creates a formatter using the specified pattern with the default resolver similar to Ruby's Time.strptime.
      TemporalAccessor parse(String text)
      Parses the text using this formatter and the registered resolver.
      TemporalAccessor parseUnresolved(String text)
      Parses the text using this formatter, without resolving the result, intended for advanced use cases.
      RubyDateTimeFormatter withResolver(RubyDateTimeResolver resolver)
      Returns a copy of this formatter with a new resolver.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • ofPattern

        public static RubyDateTimeFormatter ofPattern(String pattern)
        Creates a formatter using the specified pattern with the default resolver similar to Ruby's Time.strptime.
        Parameters:
        pattern - the pattern to use, not null
        Returns:
        the formatter based on the pattern, not null

      • parseUnresolved

        public TemporalAccessor parseUnresolved(String text)
        Parses the text using this formatter, without resolving the result, intended for advanced use cases.
        Parameters:
        text - the text to parse, not null
        Returns:
        the parsed text
        Throws:
        RubyDateTimeParseException - if the parse results in an error

      • parse

        public TemporalAccessor parse(String text)
        Parses the text using this formatter and the registered resolver.
        Parameters:
        text - the text to parse, not null
        Returns:
        the parsed temporal object, not null
        Throws:
        RubyDateTimeParseException - if unable to parse the requested result

      • withResolver

        public RubyDateTimeFormatter withResolver(RubyDateTimeResolver resolver)
        Returns a copy of this formatter with a new resolver.
        Parameters:
        resolver - the new resolver, not null
        Returns:
        a formatter based on this formatter with the requested resolver, not null
